Galaxy s9 camera is disappointing in real life. The hype created by showing the variable aperture on paper, doesnâ€™t make much difference in practical. Pixel 2 is outstanding in camera department. Image processing is alot better in pixel2. Hdr in pixel 2 is amazing. Ofcourse samsung is the king in lowlight shots. Samsung needs to improve camera by software updates inorder to compete with the pixel 2. 
The one who wants the phone only for camera, S9 is not the best choice. But who cares about all the parameters like design, camera, performance S9 is the best you can get. Samsung had the best execution of bezel less display  without any notch. S9 is the best smartphone you can get right now.

I like how the Bixby assistant helps us translate and find different places. One thing I'd like to know more about- can Bixby hold a fluent conversation yet? It would be highly beneficial to have a phone assistant that can talk to you, and answer/respond just as another person would, giving Bixby a personality and human-like interaction. I greatly hope Samsung will look into improving and updating Bixby's A.I. I am eagerly awaiting Samsung's next designs!
